title: Tamwell Turntable Mat for Audiophile and DJs Slip Mat 12 Inch Silicone Universal Turntable Platter Mat with Antistatic Cloth
features: Universal turntable mat replacement for your rubber, cork or felt turntable slipmat.
12 Inch platter mat designed to be used on any brand of turntable.
Non-slip silicone mat for turntable to play all your LPs and vinyl records perfectly and keep them flat.
Perfect for the professional DJ, audiophile, or anyone looking to replace the mat for their turntable.
Antistatic cloth (4 Inch by 4 Inch Square) included with this slipmat.
description: Tamwell Turntable Mat 12 Inch Universal Platter Mat for Turntable with Antistatic Cloth
Protect and preserve those irreplaceable classic LPs.
By eliminating static, vibration, rumble and wobble, you ensure accurate sound reproduction to satisfy even the most discerning audiophile and professional DJ.
Improve, enhance and update the appearance of your stereo equipment.
You value your vinyl collection, show that love by allowing it deliver its best performances for you.
One 4 inch by 4 inch square antistatic cloth
